message: Wrong lexicographical order for 'com.typesafe.config.Config' import. Should be before 'java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicInteger'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'com.typesafe.config.ConfigFactory' import. Should be before 'java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicInteger'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'TransformationMessages.TransformationJob' import. Should be before 'java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicInteger'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'akka.actor.ActorRef' import. Should be before 'scala.concurrent.duration.FiniteDuration'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'akka.actor.ActorSystem' import. Should be before 'scala.concurrent.duration.FiniteDuration'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'akka.actor.Props' import. Should be before 'scala.concurrent.duration.FiniteDuration'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'akka.dispatch.OnSuccess' import. Should be before 'scala.concurrent.duration.FiniteDuration'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'akka.util.Timeout' import. Should be before 'scala.concurrent.duration.FiniteDuration'.
Import statement for 'akka.pattern.Patterns.ask' is in the wrong order. Should be in the 'STATIC' group, expecting not assigned imports on this line.
'ConfigFactory' has incorrect indentation level 6, expected level should be 8.
'+' should be on a new line.
'.' has incorrect indentation level 6, expected level should be 8.
'.' has incorrect indentation level 6, expected level should be 8.
'method def modifier' has incorrect indentation level 10, expected level should be one of the following: 14, 16, 18.
'method def' child has incorrect indentation level 12, expected level should be one of the following: 16, 18, 20.
'method def rcurly' has incorrect indentation level 10, expected level should be one of the following: 14, 16, 18.
'object def rcurly' has incorrect indentation level 8, expected level should be one of the following: 12, 14, 16.
